queries.name: dbdemos - fraud_detection_30dcount
queries.query:
select ts, count(1) nbFraudTransactions, sum(amount) sumFraudTransactions--, label 
from(
    select from_unixtime(unix_timestamp(current_timestamp()) + (step * 3600)) ts, amount--, label
    from dbdemos.fsi_fraud_detection.gold_transactions
    join (--just getting the last 30 days
        select max(step)-(24*30) windowStart, max(step) windowEnd 
        from dbdemos.fsi_fraud_detection.gold_transactions
    ) on step >= windowStart and step <= windowEnd
    where is_fraud
) group by ts--, label
order by ts

queries.name: dbdemos - fraud_detection_sankey_nbpercountry
queries.query:
select countryOrig , countryDest , type, value from (
    select countryOrig , countryDest , type, count(amount ) as value from dbdemos.fsi_fraud_detection.gold_transactions
    where amount > 350000
    group by countryOrig , countryDest ,type
) order by value desc
limit 20

--in terms of number of transactions
--russia making / receiving more transactions > 350000, than othr countries
--most these transactions are transfer

queries.name: dbdemos - fraud_detection_toporiginaccount
queries.query:
select * from (
    select nameOrig , count(1) as nbTransactions 
    from dbdemos.fsi_fraud_detection.gold_transactions
    join (--just getting the last 30 days
        select max(step)-(24*30) windowStart, max(step) windowEnd 
        from dbdemos.fsi_fraud_detection.gold_transactions
    ) on step >= windowStart and step <= windowEnd
    where is_fraud
    group by nameOrig
) 
order by nbTransactions desc
limit 1

queries.name: dbdemos - fraud_detection_topdestaccount
queries.query:
select * from (
    select nameDest , count(1) as nbTransactions 
    from dbdemos.fsi_fraud_detection.gold_transactions
    join (--just getting the last 30 days
        select max(step)-(24*30) windowStart, max(step) windowEnd 
        from dbdemos.fsi_fraud_detection.gold_transactions
    ) on step >= windowStart and step <= windowEnd
    where is_fraud
    group by nameDest
) 
order by nbTransactions desc
limit 1

queries.name: dbdemos - fraud_detection_map_sumpercountry
queries.query:
select countryOrig , countryDest , type, value from (
    select countryOrig , countryDest , type, sum(amount ) as value from dbdemos.fsi_fraud_detection.gold_transactions
    where is_fraud and amount > 350000
    group by countryOrig , countryDest ,type
) order by value desc
limit 100

queries.name: dbdemos - fraud_detection_count
queries.query:
select count(1) as nbTransactions 
    from dbdemos.fsi_fraud_detection.gold_transactions
    join (--just getting the last 30 days
        select max(step)-(24*30) windowStart, max(step) windowEnd 
        from dbdemos.fsi_fraud_detection.gold_transactions
    ) on step >= windowStart and step <= windowEnd
    where is_fraud

query.name: dbdemos - fraud_detection_30dcount
query.query:
select ts, count(1) nbFraudTransactions, sum(amount) sumFraudTransactions--, label 
from(
    select from_unixtime(unix_timestamp(current_timestamp()) + (step * 3600)) ts, amount--, label
    from dbdemos.fsi_fraud_detection.gold_transactions
    join (--just getting the last 30 days
        select max(step)-(24*30) windowStart, max(step) windowEnd 
        from dbdemos.fsi_fraud_detection.gold_transactions
    ) on step >= windowStart and step <= windowEnd
    where is_fraud
) group by ts--, label
order by ts

query.name: dbdemos - fraud_detection_toporiginaccount
query.query:
select * from (
    select nameOrig , count(1) as nbTransactions 
    from dbdemos.fsi_fraud_detection.gold_transactions
    join (--just getting the last 30 days
        select max(step)-(24*30) windowStart, max(step) windowEnd 
        from dbdemos.fsi_fraud_detection.gold_transactions
    ) on step >= windowStart and step <= windowEnd
    where is_fraud
    group by nameOrig
) 
order by nbTransactions desc
limit 1

widgets.text:
### Observations
In terms of number of >$350k transactions :
- Russia is initiating / receiving more transactions, than any other country
- Most these transactions are transfers

    join (--just getting the last 30 days

query.name: dbdemos - fraud_detection_map_sumpercountry
query.query:
select countryOrig , countryDest , type, value from (
    select countryOrig , countryDest , type, sum(amount ) as value from dbdemos.fsi_fraud_detection.gold_transactions
    where is_fraud and amount > 350000
    group by countryOrig , countryDest ,type
) order by value desc
limit 100

widgets.text:
# Fraud Analysis on the Lakehouse

Existing Fraud Analysis ingested in our Lakehouse

This data is then used by our Data Scientists to build a ML model and evaluate transaction risk to provide real-time Fraud Detection capabilities.

widgets.text:
### Disclaimer 
This dataset is was generated in most part using a [PaySim](https://github.com/EdgarLopezPhD/PaySim) mobile money simulator. It is thus entirely synthetic and does not represent real individuals and transactions.
